column4: this month's issue of maximumpc says linux is now easier than ever and the time to use it is now:  http://www.maximumpc.com/this_month
they picked ubuntu in their example
I agree. I've been tring linux installations for many, many years. Ubuntu is the first one I got running satisfactorily and I then made the switch from windows permanently

I use both mandriva and ubuntu.  I think ubuntu handles updates much easier but sometimes things won't work on ubuntu when on mandriva I install something and it just works.  But the latest version of ubuntu may be much better now.
